kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: In the kitchen, you can see a table with a half eaten sandwich left behind. There is a fire with a black pot with steaming liquid and underneath the window to the east is a sink and cabinets.

west_of_house.title: West of House
west_of_house.description:
West of House
You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.
There is a mailbox here.

north_of_house.title: North of House
north_of_house.description: You are standing north of a white house. You there are windows here but they are boarded up.

south_of_house.title: South of House
south_of_house.description: You are standing on the south side of a white house. There is a gravel path to the east
